recipesJson.name: Sang Pétillant One-Shots - LiquidBarn Tastemakers
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is the One-Shot recipe for the bubbly & semi-dry champagne with bright and vivid blood orange recipe, Sang Pétillant.

Pick up Sang Pétillant here:
https://diyordie.link/sangpetillant-atf

Pick up the special Dragonfruit version for the UK:
https://diyordie.link/dragonmousseux-atf
